column2: Seven $1 billion-plus drugs seen reaching market in 2016 LONDON
column3: Feb 3 Drug companies are likely to launch seven "blockbuster" drugs in 2016
column4: each with $1 billion-plus annual sales potential
column5: led by new treatments for liver disease and HIV
column6: according to a Thomson Reuters analysis.

column2: KKR's energy chief Lipschultz leaves to start new fundUPDATE 1-Goldman's Blankfein says "feeling great" after cancer treatmentGoldman's Blankfein says 'feeling great' after cancer treatmentEsposito named chief strategy officer of Goldman securities unit -memoUPDATE 1-Goldman to create new credit finance groupUPDATE 1-Goldman names Esposito head of strategy for securities unit -memoGoldman names Esposito head of strategy for securities unit: memo Goldman Sachs Group Inc  has named Jim Esposito as the new chief strategy officer for its securities division.    Esposito
column3: previously the 48-year-old co-head of the company's global financing group
column4: will help determine the best way to address clients' capital needs given market structure changes and a challenging regulatory environment
column5: according to an internal memo reviewed by Reuters on Wednesday.     A Goldman Sachs spokesman confirmed the contents of the memo.     Es  Goldman names Esposito head of strategy for securities unit: memo Goldman Sachs Group Inc  has named Jim Esposito as the new chief strategy officer for its securities division.    Esposito
column6: previously the 48-year-old co-head of the company's global financing group

column2: KFC wins China payout over mutant chicken rumoursKFC wins China payout over mutant chicken rumoursKFC wins China payout over mutant chicken rumors SHANGHAI A Shanghai court has fined three local tech firms for helping spread rumours about Yum Brands Inc's KFC fast food chain that included doctored photos of deformed chickens and allegations the birds had six wings and eight legs.
